uk.me.berndporr.iirj

Class SOSCascade

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.me.berndporr.iirj.Cascade
      • uk.me.berndporr.iirj.SOSCascade

  • public class SOSCascade
extends Cascade
    User facing class which contains two methods to create Custom SOS filters. This is done in this way: SOSCascade sosCascase = new SOSCascade(); Then call one of the setup() methods below to set the SOS coefficients.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(double[][] sosCoefficients,
                  int directFormType)
        Sets directly the coefficients of the chain of 2nd order filters. The layout of the array is excatly how the scipy python design functions output the sos coeffcients: b0,b1,b2,a0,a1,a2. The filter type can be either DirectFormAbstract.DIRECT_FORM_II or DirectFormAbstract.DIRECT_FORM_I.
        Parameters:
        sosCoefficients - SOS coefficients
        directFormType - Direct form type (I or II).

      • setup

        public void setup(double[][] sosCoefficients)
        Sets directly the coefficients of the chain of 2nd order filters. The layout of the array is excatly how the scipy python design functions output the coeffcients: b0,b1,b2,a0,a1,a2. The filter type is DIRECT_FORM_II.
        Parameters:
        sosCoefficients - SOS coefficients
